alert.note: Alert for Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:29AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Henry County through 115 AM CDT... At 1229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abbeville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Haleburg, Murphy Station, Barnes, Dancey, Miller, Hardwickburg, Capps, Willis Crossroads and Balkum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
